MemoryInfobox.description: 'A map containing vital strategic information was stolen from the Spartan camp. Kassandra was asked to track the culprit and return the missing item to the Polemarch.'

General_Description: '''The Missing Map''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra spoke to a [[Sparta]]n ''[[polemarch]]'', who was searching for a missing tablet.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra travelled to a small Spartan camp in [[Pagai]]. She found the camp to be in a mess.
*'''Spartan [[Hoplite]]:''' ''Sweep the camp! Make sure every Spartan is accounted for. By [[Apollo]], was everyone asleep? Come on, find the bastard!''
Kassandra spoke to the ''polemarch'', who was speaking to one of the Spartans.
*'''Spartan Hoplite:''' ''Don't come back until you have the tablet.''
*'''Spartan Light Soldier:''' ''Yes, Polemarch.''
The soldier left the camp.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Lost something?''
*'''Spartan Hoplite:''' ''Not lost, stolen.''
Kassandra presented her badge.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Stentor sent me, said you've been having trouble with spies.''
*'''Spartan Hoplite:''' ''I'd take an [[Athens|Athenian]] spy over a Spartan traitor. Either way he must be found. He took a tablet with vital intelligence.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Where's your spy? Is he still in the camp?''
*'''Spartan Hoplite:''' ''Wouldn't need you if I knew. I doubt he's still here. Can't have gone far though, he was injured when he took out the guard.''
<tabber>
|-|That's not the Spartan way.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This doesn't sound like something a Spartan would do?''
*'''Spartan Hoplite:''' ''he could be an imposter, we've had raids on our supplies recently. And Megaris has more mercenaries than a goat has ticks. And what man would turn their back on Sparta?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll get him and your tablet.''
|-|I will catch the traitor.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Whoever he is, I will make him pay for betraying Sparta.''
*'''Spartan Hoplite:''' ''[[Mercenary|Misthios]]! If this man is a Spartan... take your time killing him.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll get the tablet for you, and deal with the one responsible.''
</tabber>
(If players choose "Where did he go?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Did you see which direction he went?''
*'''Spartan Hoplite:''' ''The men said he went towards the hill, easier to avoid pursuit in that terrain.''
(If players choose "What can you tell me about the area?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Anything you can tell me that might help?''
*'''Spartan Hoplite:''' ''The area is hotly contested, but Sparta is winning. We're pushing the Athenians back, but due to the war the forests and mountains have become a hive for bandits and mercenaries.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I mean about where your spy might have gone.''
*'''Spartan Hoplite:''' ''He's injured, and there's a spring up there in the forest. If it was me I would have headed there.''
(If players choose "I'll be back when I have your tablet.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll be back soon with your tablet.''
*'''Spartan Hoplite:''' ''The mountains and forest of [[Megaris]] are dangerous, and he surely didn't work alone.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm more than capable of handling your spy. Chaire.''
Kassandra headed to the forest southwest of Pagai. With [[Ikaros]]' help, she found the injured spy tied up, interrogated by a group of bandits.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's the thief.''
Kassandra approached them secretly and overheard their conversation.
*'''Mercenary:''' ''So, you got it then.''
*'''Athenian Light Soldier:''' ''Of course I got it, but the bastards stabbed me while I was getting out.''
*'''Mercenary:''' ''That's a shame, we can't have you slowing us down. But the upside is less people to split the [[drachma]]e with.''
*'''Athenian Light Soldier:''' ''Wait, please, we don't have to do this.''
*'''Mercenary:''' ''Sorry, but there ain't no we anymore.''
[[File:ACOD The Missing Map Screenshot 02.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra speaking to the spy]]
Kassandra sneaked in and eliminated the bandits and his guards. She untied the spy.
*'''Athenian Light Soldier:''' ''Wha... What do you want? Who are you?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm the one who's going to return the tablet you stole.''
(If players choose "Why did you steal it?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Why did you steal the tablet?''
*'''Athenian Light Soldier:''' ''Because I was paid to.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Who paid you?''
*'''Athenian Light Soldier:''' ''A mercenary, [[Hyrkanos]], all right? Gave me the Spartan uniform, told me where to look. Easy drachmae.''
(If players choose "How did you get into the camp?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''How did you get into the camp?''
*'''Athenian Light Soldier:''' ''Spartans never suspect their own... Too busy looking down on the rest of us. Malakes!''
(If players choose "Give me the tablet.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Give it to me, I'm not leaving without it.''
*'''Athenian Light Soldier:''' ''There's no winners in this war, but there are opportunities. Perhaps we could come to an arrangement?''
<tabber>
|-|Let's make a deal.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What arrangmenet would that be?''
The thief handed over the tablet and some drachmae.
*'''Athenian Light Soldier:''' ''Here, take the tablet... and this for your troubles. No one knows who I am. Nobody else needs to die here.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Go... Make sure I never see your face again.''
|-|You can walk away from this.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Give me the tablet, or I will cut you down.''
*'''Athenian Light Soldier:''' ''I can't fight you. Here, take the tablet.''
Kassandra received the tablet.
|-|Attack – I'm taking the tablet.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take the tablet now.''
*'''Athenian Light Soldier:''' ''Like fuck you will.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Then only one of us will be getting paid today.''
Kassandra fought and eliminated the Athenian soldier. She recovered the tablet and a note form his body.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What's this? A note... So the tablet was meant for Hyrkanos, not the Athenians...''
</tabber>
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I should get this tablet back to the commander.''
[[File:ACOD The Missing Map Screenshot 03.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra returning the tablet to the ''polemarch'']]
Kassandra returned to the ''polemarch''.
*'''Spartan Hoplite:''' ''So, did you find the traitor?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's not traitors you need to worry about. He was a spy working for the mercenary Hyrkanos.''
*'''Spartan Hoplite:''' ''Hyrkanos. How many times must I hear that name? His palms must be overflowing with Athenian gold by now. Did you get the tablet?''
Kassandra handed over the tablet.
Section_Notes: *Depending on the decision made, it is possible to meet the spy again and recruit him aboard the ''[[Adrestia]]''.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the Spartan ''polemarch'' to recover an important tablet.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] ''
